objects.src: <svg width='1080' height='1080' viewBox='0 0 1080 1080' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><defs><radialGradient id='bg' cx='50%' cy='50%' r='70%'><stop offset='0%' stop-color='#D6000D'/><stop offset='100%' stop-color='#950000'/></radialGradient><linearGradient id='shine' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' stop-color='#FFFFFF' stop-opacity='0.3'/><stop offset='100%' stop-color='#FFFFFF' stop-opacity='0'/></linearGradient></defs><rect width='1080' height='1080' fill='url(#bg)'/><g opacity='0.15'><path d='M50,50 L1030,50 L1030,1030 L50,1030 Z' stroke='#FFFFFF' stroke-width='2' fill='none'/><path d='M100,100 L980,100 L980,980 L100,980 Z' stroke='#FFFFFF' stroke-width='2' fill='none'/></g><g transform='translate(540,540)'><polygon points='-400,-400 400,-400 0,400' fill='#000000' opacity='0.2'/><polygon points='-380,-380 380,-380 0,380' fill='#FF6600' opacity='0.1'/></g><rect x='0' y='0' width='1080' height='1080' fill='url(#shine)' opacity='0.3'/><g transform='translate(30,30)'><circle cx='0' cy='0' r='8' fill='#FF9800'/><circle cx='20' cy='0' r='8' fill='#FF9800'/><circle cx='40' cy='0' r='8' fill='#FF9800'/><circle cx='0' cy='20' r='8' fill='#FF9800'/><circle cx='20' cy='20' r='8' fill='#FF9800'/><circle cx='40' cy='20' r='8' fill='#FF9800'/></g><g transform='translate(1020,980)' opacity='0.7'><circle cx='0' cy='0' r='8' fill='#FF9800'/><circle cx='20' cy='0' r='8' fill='#FF9800'/><circle cx='0' cy='20' r='8' fill='#FF9800'/><circle cx='20' cy='20' r='8' fill='#FF9800'/></g></svg>

objects.text: Pack of 64 | Crunchy Tortilla Chips | Classic Cheese Flavor

product_details.description: Pack of 64, 1.75 ounce large single serving bags (total of 112 ounces) Doritos tortilla chips with classic nacho cheese flavor Made of whole corn; flavorings feature real cheddar cheese Crunchy straight from the bag or after scooping up dip or salsa Ships in Certified Frustration Free Packaging Brand - Doritos ** Flavor - Nacho Cheese ** Unit Count - 112.0 Ounce ** Number of Items - 64 ** Type - Tortilla Chip **

banner_details:
This promotional banner showcases a snack product with a strong visual impact and clean hierarchical layout. It features a vibrant red gradient background with subtle linear frame elements and radial shapes that draw focus to the center. The main visual is a centered product image ("product_image") positioned above a price display ("price"), reinforced with clear typography. The top section includes a bold headline ("heading") and subheader ("subheading"), establishing the brand and product type. Supporting product details are conveyed through the "description" text layer. A bright yellow call-to-action button ("cta_button") with black "cta" text ensures clear visual contrast for conversion.

**Color Palette:**
- Deep Red: #950000
- Bright Red: #D6000D
- White: #FFFFFF
- Orange: #FF9800
- Yellow-Orange: #FF6600
- Black: #000000
product_color: The Doritos Nacho Cheese product image features a vivid and bold color palette that effectively captures attention. The dominant color is a fiery red-orange (#C1272D), used for the background, symbolizing intensity and flavor. This is blended with darker red gradients (#8B1A1A) adding depth and contrast. The Doritos chips use rich cheese orange (#F9A602) and golden yellow (#FDB813), representing its cheesy flavor and warmth. The logo combines black (#000000) with white (#FFFFFF) and is outlined with a gradient flame effect containing bright yellow (#FFCC00) and orange (#FF7F00). This vibrant palette makes the product visually appealing and ready for energetic advertisement design.
